content:
IDataFormat Interface

In this Article

Provides support for the crosoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.DBinding.DataFormat* property of the DBinding interface.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.Guid("AF08B280-90F2-11D0-9484-00A0C91110ED")]
[System.Runtime.InteropServices.InterfaceType(System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComInterfaceType.InterfaceIsIUnknown)]
public interface IDataFormat

Remarks

This interface is used internally by the tools for upgrading Visual Basic 6.0 applications to Visual Basic.

> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the N:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to Visual Basic 2008. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the .NET Framework. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the .NET Framework implementation.

Methods summary

Clone(IDataFormat)

Creates a shallow copy of the IDataFormat.
Convert(Int32,Object,Object)

Converts an IDataFormat to a Visual Basic 6.0 Variant.
Default(Boolean)

Determines whether an IDataFormat is the default IDataFormat.
GetBinding(VarEnum,Int32,IRowset,DBCOLUMNINFO,DBBINDING,Int32,Int32)

Gets a binding for a IDataFormat.
GetData(Int32,IntPtr,Object,Int32,Object)

Gets the data for an IDataFormat interface.
GetLcid(Int32)

Gets a locale ID for an IDataFormat interface.
GetRawData(Int32,IntPtr,Object,Int32)

Gets the raw data for an IDataFormat interface.
GetSubFormatType(Int32)

Gets the subformat type for an IDataFormat interface.
ReleaseBinding(Int32)

Releases a binding for an IDataFormat interface.
ReleaseData(Int32,IntPtr)

Releases the data for an IDataFormat interface.
SetData(Int32,Object,IntPtr,Object)

Sets the data for an IDataFormat interface.
SetLcid(Int32)

Sets the locale ID for an IDataFormat.
SetRawData(Int32,Object,IntPtr)

Sets the raw data for an IDataFormat.
SetSubFormatType(Int32)

Sets the subformat type for an IDataFormat interface.
